attributes.action: Award honourary knight hoods on Neil Peart, Alex Lifeson and Geddy Lee of Canadian group Rush
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rush have sold over 45m albums world wide, have been going for over 34 years. They have been awarded to Order of Canada, but if a UK band would have knighthoods by now. The were the 5th best selling live act in the world in 2007 (only 1/2 way through tour).
Surely a better commonwealth award/honour should be given?
